content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment. How much were you thinking of paying per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student, so I have a limited budget. I was thinking of paying 500 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 500 Euro per month is quite a low offer considering the location and the quality of the apartment. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my expenses and make a profit. Would you be willing to negotiate a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, Mister Schmidt. How about 600 Euro per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 600 Euro per month is more in line with what I had in mind. However, I believe this apartment is worth even more, given its prime location and modern amenities. Would you be willing to go up to 700 Euro per month? That would be a fair deal for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. How about 650 Euro per month? It's a good middle ground.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. 650 Euro per month is a fair price. I think we can agree on that. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
